usage_rules: CONTEXT: Troy from Community walks in with pizza expecting normalcy but finds complete chaos
EXPECTATION: What the person is trying to do/enjoy normally (Frame 1, above pizza boxes)
CHAOS1-4: Various chaotic elements happening in the room (Frame 2, labeled around the chaos)
IMPORTANT: This is a multi-label meme - all text areas should work together to tell the story
TONE: Overwhelming chaos contrasted with innocent expectations
BEST FOR: Showing how multiple things go wrong simultaneously when you expected peace
cultural_context: From Community S3E4 'Remedial Chaos Theory' where Troy returns with pizza to find the apartment on fire. The meme captures the feeling of walking into an unexpectedly chaotic situation when you were expecting normalcy. Perfect for depicting multiple simultaneous disasters.
text_positioning_note: Frame 1 has one centered text above Troy. Frame 2 has 4 different text areas positioned around various chaotic elements in the burning room.
